language_selection: Choose another Language to see content specific to you
get_cdn: Get CDN and deliver static and dynamic content at ultra-fast speeds across our global network.
boost_speed: Boost your website speed: Get CDN from one of the world’s fastest providers.
extra_performance: Plus, make your site even faster and more reliable by adding performance products that serve your site via the fastest internet connections while ensuring zero downtime.
partners_title: Cloudflare powers millions of Internet properties
partners_subtitle: Here are some you might recognize
benefits_title: Discover the benefits of the Cloudflare CDN
benefit1_description: Cloudflare distributes your website's content across 310 data centers worldwide. This makes sure that no matter where your visitors are, they can access your site quickly and without any noticeable delays.
benefit2_description: Cloudflare distributes your website's content across 310 data centers worldwide. This ensures quick access to content no matter where your visitors are.
benefit3_description: Reduce requests to your origin server by caching content on the Cloudflare CDN, resulting in lower bandwidth usage and costs.
ultimate_description: This trio creates a synergy that optimizes content delivery.
ultimate_additional: free CDN + AI analysis + VIP defender
premium_description: Optimize content delivery with Argo smart routing.
steps_subtitle: It's only take 5 minutes to complete the setup.
step1_description: You only need an email and a password. That’s all!
step2_description: Add your site and choose a service plan based on the level of functionality and support you need.
step3_description: Make a quick change to your DNS settings in your registrar's dashboard (we'll show you how).
step4_description: Activate Cloudflare features in minutes to take advantage of all the performance benefits.
